website_summaries.verdict: A light yet rugged shoe - the Jack Wolfskin Vojo Hike 2 Texapore Low is well-loved for its quality build and durable construction. It’s suitable not only for hiking but also for casual activities off the trail. Overall, the Jack Wolfskin Vojo is one tough hiking shoe although it runs a bit narrow for some. It’s a simple, classic shoe that offers good support and traction while keeping the foot comfortable and dry.
pros: The majority of those who have purchased a pair of Jack Wolfskin Vojo Hike 2 Texapore Low are satisfied with its durable construction
Many are surprised that it’s pretty light for a hiking shoe
Hikers who have used the shoe on rocky trails are impressed by its great traction
Most wearers say that the shoe runs true to size
They also say that it’s a good all-around shoe
Most use it for hiking while others use it for urban walks and casual work
Customers like that it’s comfortable to wear, despite being a rugged shoe
cons: One reviewer says that the Jack Wolfskin Vojo hiker has a narrow toe box

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality and fit. They are good quality walking shoes. Because of the boottree of the Jack Wolfskin Men's Vojo Hike 2 Texapore, I ordered one size above my normal shoe size. Thanks for the efficient and speedy delivery of item.
customer_reviews.author: O.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great walking shoes I liked them so much I bought a second pair
customer_reviews.author: I. Cruickshank

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for approx 4 months on most week days walking approx 5 miles a day and here's what I found - Didn't like the fact there is no support for the arches, this meant I had to buy some insoles. After 4 months use, the heel of my right foot has worn down and now has a hole in (My Nike AF1's last about a year before this happens). Finally the laces are the round type that undo by themselves despite using all my strength to tighten them. Needless to say I wouldn't recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzywuzzywuzzawoman

customer_reviews.title: Would prefer something on the ligher side
customer_reviews.text: Find these a bit heavy for me, am used to wearing something that feels ligher on. They are also a bit on the wide side for me, my right foot is way longer than my left, so I like something tight width wise, on the narrow side so my left foot does not move about much. Looks well enough made, but I wouldnt say it was a flat out running shoe. Would rate it mid-season Spring/Autumn too warm for Summer not heavy enough for Winter. Shoe length is on the short side, I would rate it closer to a 13.5 UK which suits me just fine, I normally take that size. Will wear heavy socks to compensate for the width.
customer_reviews.author: S. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Individuality of fit
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe and excellent gripping sole (albeit indoors on stone, wood and carpet flooring) and supportive sole Fit too tight for me over longer term across the top of and behind the toe’s though length seemed perfect and heel stiff would require some breaking in to avoid potential scrubbing/blisters - otherwise a great shoe
customer_reviews.author: vee bee

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the comfort factor
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as replacements for my normal Merrell brand as they where attractively priced and i like the brand. Good waterproof features and went for my normal 1/2 size extra to allow for thicker socks etc whereas i think my normal size 9 would have been a better bet. Attractive looking and well made but not sure about the footbed comfort factor being up to the same quality as the likes of the Merrell thus the reason for knocking of a star in the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Waterproofness
customer_reviews.text: I found these Trainers comfortable and they seem well made with a good sole. I am unable to test the waterproofness as they weather has changed and the paths / fields have dried out. I have now found out that the waterproofness of these trainers suspect ,I have had wet socks on one foot during damp to light wet weather
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - worn out in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in 5 months ago and wear them for dog walking and light trekking ( NationalTrust parks etc). Very comfortable and waterproof but they have not lasted. The sole has worn through at the heels. It maybe that I have an awkward walk, or that I use them a lot but I have never worn through a pair of hiking shoes or boots in less than a year. A real shame, as I liked them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: K. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Gave me blisters and was smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were nice looking but giving a low dish review as they came not true to size. They were a bit tight at the front and this has given me pain. There’s also a bit that sticks in the Achilles that is uncomfortable and gave me blisters. I wish I wasn’t too lazy to return the item. Will keep trying to wear them in I guess. I would order a half size up or more if getting these, maybe with thick socks they are better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T.

customer_reviews.title: Far too small, unlike other Jack Wolfskin shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe but very cramped on my foot, which is surprising as I have had several pairs of Wolfskins before. It seems they've changed the fit. Had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: ginner

customer_reviews.title: Short life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough shoe but only lasted 5 months before the ribbons that the laces thread through broke. Shoe no longer fits as snug as it should and although the soles have plenty of wear in them yet I will need to replace them. Very disappointed, wouldnt recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hamsterboots

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these shoes daily for two weeks. I am very pleased with the quality and fit and there very comfortable. This is my second pair of Jack wolfskin shoe's, the First pair lasted over four years of daily use. A bargain price at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Sd Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good quality walking shoes - consider ordering half a size larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: Good quality walking shoes. After looking at other reviews I ordered half a size above my normal shoe size which was good as these fit well. If you have slightly wider feet you may find these shoes a little narrow towards the toe, but upping the size seems to fix this. The soles are quite rigid which is good for broken ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product to wear from day 1
customer_reviews.text: Put these shoes on straight out of the box and they do not need any wearing in. may be very slightly narrow in the fit, but generally are a great fit and true to size. will definitely recommend and re-order when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kevin Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes fairly extensively ( 4 out of 7 days) for walking and general outdoor chores. I ordered half a size bigger and this meant that they fit well however they are perhaps not the most comfortable. On both shoes, achilles heal area has begun to come apart and this is after just 4 months of wear. Unfortunately I can not recommend them for purchase and Im unlikely to purchase Jack Wolfskin again.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Farnfield

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for men
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my partner. He loves them. He says they’re so comfortable. Pretty much hasn’t taken them off since he took them out of the box. Patting myself on the back for finding them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought i was getting a bargain. Hiw disappointed was I. Shoe's appeared to fit perfectly when i tried them on in the house. Went for a walk along the beach blisters the size of golf balls. Shoe's kept slipping. No matter how I tied the laces. Tried a few times with the same result. My son had also tried them. Same result. What a waste of money. I was so looking forward to these shoe's. Will never buy Jack Wolfskin again........
customer_reviews.author: Ed Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Quality of shoes appeared to be good. Whilst the length of the shoes was ok the width across the toes was too narrow and big toes pushed hard against the top of the shoes. Returned same day as delivery.
customer_reviews.author: G. Parkin

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Efficient and speedy delivery of item. Had read reviews about fit not being as expected, no problems with them as i dohave wide feet. Good fit anf comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Ward

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality - I did not have to go up 1 size as some people have found .. They look great and feel comfortable. I have also ordered them again in a different colour.
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes & very comfortable shoes. This is the second time I am buying Wolfskin shoes. I was very satisfied from the previous pair I had !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What A Shame.......
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for these shoes as I've had good experience with JW jackets. I normally take a size 9 in everything but these came up a bit big & didn't feel right so they had to be returned
customer_reviews.author: Mr FA Murray

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good time, not had them long but they fit well and are fairly comfortable in the wearing in period so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent walking shoes and incredibly comfortable. Recent rain but remain waterproof on our dog walks.
customer_reviews.author: Philisfine

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit ok but thay are a narrow fit so might be an idea to get a size larger ..that was what I did ...
customer_reviews.author: thomas norman greenhow

customer_reviews.title: Look good, fit nice Don't stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: Looked good, fitted nicely, comfy. Longevity rubbish. Bought in May, loop that laces go through snapped. Not waterproof and sole already degraded.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Liley

customer_reviews.title: Great to start with
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression was very favourable - appeared well made, comfortable fit (I find most makes rather narrow). But after wearing for 1 hour - 90 minutes a day for just over 3 months, a hole has worn in the lining at the heel of both shoes and the left one is beginning to squeak.
customer_reviews.author: Chingford Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit hubby perfectly. He is happy. Light but Great quality. Waterproof. They look nice.
customer_reviews.author: doireannw

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for every day walking
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable, value for money, not for arduous hill walking
customer_reviews.author: John Mawhinney

customer_reviews.title: Jack Wolfskin Men's Vojo Hike 2 Texapore; A good buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are waterproof and good for rough country walking with my springer spaniel. They are SO comfortable. A brilliant buy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Keen

customer_reviews.title: Great footwear.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly packaged and great quality. Arrived on time. Would buy from this seller again..!! 👍
customer_reviews.author: richard devenney

customer_reviews.title: Really good service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered trainers on Saturday, they arrived on Monday. fantastic! Thanks guys, really great service. will order again no problem
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use the footwear for trekking they r well comfy and good qy
customer_reviews.author: hot tot

customer_reviews.title: Good lite weight walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Feel lite on the feet and well made have done a lot of walking in them and found them very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased before, and use for work, as can be on feet all day, and walking long distances. Very comfortable. Previous pair lasted for at least 18 months wearing daily
customer_reviews.author: Richard Booth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Present for my father who takes walks around the city. Has found them comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived within a day, great quality and really smart looking shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: 4 Months tread gone on heel letting water in after an hour of walking in rain not that comfortable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. J. Parry

product_meta.title: Jack Wolfskin Men's Vojo Hike 2 Texapore Low M Wasserdicht Rise Shoes
product_meta.description: Designed for woodland trails, roads and gravel tracks, the VOJO HIKE 2 TEXAPORE LOW is a simple yet highly versatile shoe. It has a classic look, it's nice and light, and it delivers good grip, support and cushioning every step of the way. The shoe has a flexible, lightweight hiking sole. It is also equipped with a waterproof TEXAPORE membrane, so if it rains your feet will stay dry.TexaporeThe materials in this group are always waterproof, windproof and breathable. These materials consist of a shell material with a water-repellent coating and a waterproof PU membrane on the inside.Circuliner ActiveParticularly breathable, quick-drying polyester lining.Traction SoleFlexible and comfortable hiking sole for easy terrain and hiking trails. The component construction consists of a non-slip rubber outsole with a non-slip profile, a flexible, cushioning midsole made of EVA and a 2 mm thick insole made of PE for more stability. The removable, perforated insole has a moisture-regulating polyester cover for added comfort. Product specific size information: Normal cut Weight per Pair: 890 g Fit: Normal Outdoor Shoes Application: Hiking Type: Low Cut Shoes Materials Inner lining: Circuliner Active Type membrane: TEXAPORE Sole Type: Rubber Sole: Traction Middle sole: EVA/PU Upper Material: Water-repellent suede and water-repellent mesh Inner lining type: Textile Waterproof Over material Type: Leather Shoe Features Features: Heel loop Closing system: Shoe laces Crampons: Not crampon-fixed
